response.original_title: Hillsong Worship: This Is Our God
response.overview: A number of new songwriters, worship leaders and musicians joined Reuben Morgan, Joel Houston, Darlene Zschech and Marty Sampson on the platform, capturing the sound of a new generation, and entering into a new season of worship and song.  This DVD features footage from the night of worship including 15 songs from the CD including a bonus song "Alive In You". Also includes the documentary "In Every Season".
response.tagline: Look around you...this is our church!
response.title: Hillsong Worship: This Is Our God
